projects.heading: Knight Frank Early Careers
projects.description: No ATS integration for this one, but a bold design system to advance Knight Frank's brand guidelines makes this site stand out.

projects.heading: Lloyds Early Careers
projects.description: The clean design and thoughtful touches made this site a joy to work on. It has been shortlisted for a handful of awards... fingers crossed!

projects.heading: Worldpay Graduates
projects.description: The Worldpay graduates site is a really clean design that was nice to work on and also included some fun features such as the card reader on the landing page.

projects.heading: Colt Careers
projects.description: This site involved an integration with SAP Success Factors to pull the vacancies data for the apply page. The apply page also implements searching vacancies, and query parameters.

projects.heading: Lastminute.com careers
projects.description: A bold design and dynamically populating job pages. Everything ran smooth except for the video headers...

projects.heading: This site!
projects.description: A static Angular site?! Built using Angular + Scully with netlify cms for content.

projects.heading: Travelex Engineering Careers
projects.description: This site had some really exciting design aspects that were a nice challenge to implement!

projects.heading: ChipChop
projects.description: My first solo freelance project! A simple static and enquiry form with great lighthouse scores!
